channel.title: Need help making regular players being able to spawn
channel.description: Hey I was wondering if someone could help me make it so regular players on my server can spawn. If you're willing to help please post your skype below. 718 source btw.

item.title: Need help making regular players being able to spawn
item.dc:creator: @newman0071 newman0071
item.description:
@newman0071 wrote:

spawn servers are pretty cool. now depending on the type your useing, you will need to do one of two things.

option one:

go into commands.java and press ctrl+f.
now type in ("item or ("pickup
do whatever your code is for instance my code is ::item so i would type ("item
now heres what it may look like: if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 3) { it should look similar
now heres what you change if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 3
now change that 3 or a 2 into a 0.
now it should read:if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 0) {

option 2
go into client.java and press ctrl+f.
now type in ("item or ("pickup
do whatever your code is for instance my code is ::item so i would type ("item
now heres what it may look like: if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 3) { it should look similar
now heres what you change if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 3
now change that 3 or a 2 into a 0.
now it should read:if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 0) {

this is spoonfed >:) hope i helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making regular players being able to spawn
